alert.note: Alert for Grayson; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 03 at 1:42AM EST until March 03 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Kentucky and south central Kentucky, including the following counties, in northwest Kentucky, Ohio. In south central Kentucky, Grayson. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Moderate to heavy rainfall late tonight and Friday morning. Rainfall totals of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
